Name: Pick
Description: Gathering tool from the Hamlet. Flexible and reliable.
Note Text: Gather items from the environment by whacking them!

Name: Wooden Hammer
Description: Sturdy tool intended for building. Slow to swing, but covers a large area.
Note Text: Hold attack down to increase damage and area!

Name: Dowsing Rod
Description: A Summer tool used for gathering waterborne resources.
Note Text: Dowse the watery depths of the Grove with this tool!

Name: Gardening Spade
Description: A giant digging tool meant for heavy Gardening. Clumsy and slow.
Note Text: Dig into Garden-Plots to foster new fauna!

Name: Parasol
Description: Sunbrella. Well crafted from weathered Driftwood.
Note Text: Beat the heat! The Parasol lunges and strikes rapidly.

Name: Sickle
Description: Quick and efficient Autumn tool for gathering and combat.
Note Text: Sick it to 'em! The Sickle strikes twice for quick gathering!

Name: Silversword
Description: A tool grown from within the Mists. Harnesses old plant magicks.

Name: Hazel Shield
Description: Thick and worn wooden shield. It continues to be a reliable barrier.

Name: Leaf Shield
Description: Bouncy, glossy leaf grown to maturity. Surprisingly heavy.

Name: Seed Pouch
Description: A small bag lined with tiny pockets. Reproduces seeds using peat.

Name: Pan Flute
Description: A curious collection of weathered reeds. Plays notes when blown into.

Name: Tool Box
Description: A box full of small tools for building. Used mostly by Architects on-the-go!
Note Text: Purchase utilities and place them in Building Plots.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Glass Jar
Description: A classic Jar for dew-drops. Common
Spanish - Description: SPN - A classic Jar for dew-drops. Common

Name: Pocket Phial
Description: Fast and tiny jar from the Summer Bar.
Spanish - Description: SPN - Fast and reliable jar from the Summer Bar. Doesn't hold very much, though.

Name: Big Jug
Description: A huuuge ol' tankard for Dew-hoarders.
Spanish - Description: SPN - A huuuge ol' tankard. Made for Autumn Town's Dew-hoarders.

Name: Cozy Flask
Description: Designed for colder climates.
Spanish - Description: SPN - Standard dew container, equipped with a Cozy to resist frost.

Name: Potion Bottle
Description: Deep vessel designed for the study of Dew.

Name: Sea Dew
Description: Well-filtered Dew cut with sea salt. Pushes enemies away after splitting.
Spanish - Description: SPN - Well-filtered Dew cut with sea salt. Pushes enemies away after splitting.

Name: Leafy Dew
Description: Dew pulsing with natural energy. Can inspire rapid growth in Stumps.
Spanish - Description: Dew pulsing with natural energy. Leafy Dew can inspire rapid growth in Stumps.

Name: Spicy Dew
Description: This Dew is known to induce a strong feeling of heat!
Spanish - Description: SPN - This Dew is known to induce a strong feeling of heat!

Name: Metallic Dew
Description: This Dew is known for its bitter, fortifying taste, and shiny finish!
Spanish - Description: SPN - This Dew is known for its bitter, fortifying taste, and shiny finish!

Name: Powdery Dew
Description: A Dew Drop of a silty nature. Destroys nearby projectiles.

Name: Fetid Dew
Description: Dew pulled from the Sewers. How could anyone use this swill?
Spanish - Description: SPN - Dew pulled from the Sewers. How could anyone use this swill?

Name: Amber Dew
Description: Dew pulled from the Grove's roots. It's more potent, but has odd side-effects.
Spanish - Description: SPN - Dew pulled from the Grove's roots. It's more potent, but has odd side-effects.

Name: Shallow Dew
Description: One could certainly call this Dew, but something is missing.
Spanish - Description: SPN - One could certainly call this Dew, but something is missing.

Name: Tap Dew
Description: Common-place Dew found anywhere in the Grove.
Spanish - Description: SPN - Common-place Dew found anywhere in the Grove.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Grove Map
Description: A dusty map made by an expert cartographer.

Name: Timepiece
Description: Keeps track of the time. Displays in your inventory!

Name: Compass Clover
Description: Works in conjunction with a Map. Its leaves pull and grow towards other places, some unknown....

Name: Personal Journal
Description: A small place to collect your thoughts. A few pages were used by Plum.
Note Text: Collect Memories to use as perks!

Name: Anemoscope
Description: Specialized tool made by Seafolk. Able to determine the day's weather.
Note Text: Track the weather in your inventory!

Name: Calendar
Description: A day-to-day event tracker made of Silk.

Name: Scrying Stone
Description: A small eye-piece repaired with a glass lens. Made of the same material as Epitaphs, and will allow you to discern their messages.
Note Text: Find a path through the Mists!

Name: Shell Cove Key
Description: An old, worn key to the storage chest in Shell Cove.

Name: Cost Book
Description: An old book used for keeping track of item costs. Reveals resource values in your inventory.

Name: Request Pencil
Description: Keep track of request locations on your map.

Name: Fauna Pencil
Description: Keep track of resources on your map.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Pebble
Description: Tiny rock. Perfect for skipping across a pond!
Spanish - Description: Tinyrock. Perfect for skipping across a pond!

Name: Rock
Description: A sizable portion of stone. Smooth.
Spanish - Description: A sizable portion of stone. Smooth.

Name: Chunk
Description: Large piece of stone.

Name: Twig
Description: A humble twig. Though small and weak, it is valued by crafters for its flexibility.
Spanish - Description: A humble twig. Though small and weak, it is valued by crafters for its flexibility.

Name: Branch
Description: A matured tree segment.

Name: Bough
Description: A dusty, thick tree segment. Its surface is tough and riddled with wear.
Spanish - Description: A dusty, thick tree segment. Its surface is tough and riddled with wear.

Name: Glass Shard
Description: A solid piece of glass. Sharp and difficult for the inexperienced to work with.
Spanish - Description: A solid piece of glass. Sharp and difficult for the inexperienced to work with.

Name: Glass Lens
Description: Perfectly circle piece of glass. It slightly distorts light.
Spanish - Description: Perfectly circle piece of glass. It slightly distorts light.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Sap
Description: Ooey gooey tree sap, clear and fresh.

Name: Flowstone
Description: A tiny rock smoothed by the flow of water.

Name: Dew Bell
Description: Oddly smooth and malleable, what Dew Bells lack in sturdiness they make up for in sheen.

Name: Amber Pearl
Description: Smooth and glittering, this ball of ancient sap is coveted for its everlasting clarity.

Name: Water Sprout
Description: A variation of Dew Sprouts, these are only found underwater. Their pliability is suited for use in crafting.

Name: Glitter Ore
Description: Description needed.

Name: Fetid Book
Description: A rotted book of contents unknown. Opening it releases a horrible smell.

Name: Sandstone
Description: Compacted and solidified, this block of sand is not strong. However, it can be ground against other materials for smoothing.

Name: Succulent
Description: The green stalk has juicy and tender leaves that jiggle ever so slightly when moved. Its contents are unfortunately bitter.

Name: Crimson Shell
Description: A discarded shell of deep red. Valued by Seafolk who dream of the sea.

Name: Yellow Shell
Description: A brightly colored shell of yellow. Blends in strongly with the Summer Bar's sands.

Name: Azure Shell
Description: A thin, ornate shell of blue. Sought after for its hardiness and crafting uses.

Name: Driftwood
Description: Aged wood from the furthest roots of Grove. The salty ocean has hardened and smoothed its dead bark.

Name: Purple Shell
Description: A sturdy shell tainted by Rot. It rocks back and forth when left alone.

Name: Corner Stone
Description: Chalky rock that naturally forms in manageable cubes. Useful for building.

Name: Pith Root
Description: A stalky plant with sturdy casing and a soft spongy interior.

Name: Empty Bauble
Description: Fragile sphere comprised of glass. The top can be unscrewed with ease, but maintains a perfect seal.

Name: Rot Bauble
Description: This bauble has Rot growing in it. While not harmful, it gives off a faintly fetid scent.

Name: Rusty Screw
Description: Long-abandoned parts meant for the Sewers. Could be useful in the right hands.

Name: Fatwood
Description: Small cut of translucent wood. Brimming with aged, flammable sap.

Name: Tombstone
Description: Dusty and solid, the cut of stone is particularly heavy. The small patterns of scripture are illegible.

Name: Peat Pellet
Description: Dense seed favored for agricultural purposes. Propagates fertile soil wherever it is planted.

Name: Moon Kelp
Description: Aquatic flora commonly found in Winter Glade. Enchanted by the Mists's proximity.

Name: Ice Cube
Description: Solid cube of water. Unfit for construction, but perfect for cooling purposes.

Name: Snowflake
Description: Crystalized Dew born from the Winter Thicket's icy Rot. Brittle but pointy and potent.

Name: Rot Wax
Description: Leftover build-up of thick goop. Only congeals in the biggest of Rot.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Marimo Ball
Description: Bouncy, blooming ball of moss. Some think it has thoughts.

Name: Cobble Piece
Description: Densely grown Cobblemoss has formed a sturdy stone composite. Heavy, but easy to handle.

Name: Candlewax
Description: Waxy interior harvested from the center of a grown Kuku'i Nut. Used for thermal sealing, crafting, and decorative purposes.

Name: Porcelain Shell
Description: Brittle, valuable shell. Faintly sweet aroma emanates from its interior.

Name: Bioluminescent Pod
Description: Glowing interior of a tender Firebloom. Carries the properties of light and dew.

Name: Golden Yolk
Description: The center of a grown Chickpea. Its shine and spreadability make it a popular choice for polishing in the Grove.

Name: Rubber Cut
Description: A cut of soft, opaque rubber. Its glittery appearance and pliable nature make it fun to play with.

Name: Twine Root
Description: Root of a weathered, dried Kukui Nut. Two slender roots grown around each other, increasing its strength considerably.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Seed Pack
Description: Restores the Seed Pouch count for all seeds you own!

Name: Cobble Moss Seed
Description: For your Seed Pouch. Small clump of spongy moss that grows quickly.

Name: Chick Pea Seed
Description: For your Seed Pouch. Hard-shelled cash-crop that slowly grows.

Name: Jelly Bean Seed
Description: For your Seed Pouch. Popular myth says this squishy legume was first pulled from the Mists.

Name: Kukui Nut Seed
Description: For your Seed Pouch. Greasy nut that grows into valuable items.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Maraschino's Duty
Description: Miffed by Plum's choice of successor, Maraschino is plagued by a lack of purpose. They have asked you to provide pebbles so they may help you with the coming Rot.

Name: A Broken Forge
Description: Waxy interior harvested from the center of a grown Kukui Nut. Used for thermal sealing, crafting, and decorative purposes.

Name: Frog Forgotten
Description: Goldie yearns to help the Hamlet in their time of need. They've procured some valuable resources to be delivered to Marsanne.

Name: Name
Description: Description

Name: Blue Snapback
Description: A cap made of thin material, designed to fit any Greenling!

Name: Mushroom Cap
Description: A cap made by Ama, stylized in their own likeness.

Name: Sprout Snapback
Description: A cap made for especially young Greenlings.

Name: Sunny Snapback
Description: A cap for avid fans of the Sun.

Name: Golden Sun Snapback
Description: A cap for avid fans of the Sun.

Name: Wayfarer's Cap
Description: Weathered but sturdy, this hat has been through many journeys.

Name: Hibiscus Flower
Description: A tiny blossom of hibiscus. Worn upon the side of one's head.

Name: Royal Crown
Description: A lavish crown made of meticulously polished ore.

Name: Yellow Rain Cap
Description: A cool way to beat the heat in the Summer Bar!

Name: Green Rain Cap
Description: A cool way to beat the heat in the Summer Bar!

Name: Red Rain Cap
Description: A cool way to beat the heat in the Summer Bar!

Name: Summer Rain Cap
Description: A cooler way to beat the heat in the Summer Bar!

Name: Found Spectacles
Description: This pair of glasses washed up on shore. Looks odd.

Name: Walnut Helm
Description: Someone has restored this antique helm! Smells quite musty.

Name: Farmer's Wide Brim
Description: Hand crafted by Autumn Town crafters for their farmers!

Name: Architect's Helm
Description: A solid, protective hat. Made for Architects.

Name: Delver's Helm
Description: A solid, protective hat. The bulb is unfortunately dead.

Name: 10-Jug Hat
Description: A popular statement piece for any wealthy Greenling!

Name: Salakot
Description: A traditional hat from old Autumn Town. Made from woven material and slightly adorned.

Name: Paper Crown
Description: A cute crown made of folded paper. Designates an avid Spring book reader!

Name: Leafy Pointed Hat
Description: A vibrant old cap for Spring mages.

Name: Bookish Cone Hat
Description: An old dusty cap for Scribess. Designates an avid Winter book reader!

Name: Sparkle Cone
Description: A cap for mages who are especially powerful.

Name: Old Pointed Hat
Description: A ratty old hat that'll keep you warm through the night!

Name: Concord's Rucksack
Description: A backpack for Concord!

Name: Sunnyside Rucksack
Description: A backpack for Concord!

Name: Ocean Courier Bag
Description: A backpack for Concord!

Name: Porter's Rack-Pack
Description: A backpack for Concord!

Name: Book Bag
Description: A backpack for Concord!
